      • file

        public java.io.InputStream file()
        Gets the file. The content of the document to ingest. The maximum supported file size when adding a file to a collection is 50 megabytes, the maximum supported file size when testing a confiruration is 1 megabyte. Files larger than the supported size are rejected.
        Returns:
        the file

      • metadata

        public java.lang.String metadata()
        Gets the metadata. The maximum supported metadata file size is 1 MB. Metadata parts larger than 1 MB are rejected. Example: ``` { "Creator": "Johnny Appleseed", "Subject": "Apples" } ```.
        Returns:
        the metadata

      • xWatsonDiscoveryForce

        public java.lang.Boolean xWatsonDiscoveryForce()
        Gets the xWatsonDiscoveryForce. When `true`, the uploaded document is added to the collection even if the data for that collection is shared with other collections.
        Returns:
        the xWatsonDiscoveryForce
